TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressIldasmAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Prevents the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](../Topic/Ildasm.exe%20\(IL%20Disassembler\).md) from disassembling an assembly. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Apply the SuppressIldasmAttribute attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](../Topic/Ildasm.exe%20\(IL%20Disassembler\).md).
This attribute does not prevent an assembly from being viewed using reflection.
Note that SuppressIldasmAttribute attribute does not block the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](../Topic/Ildasm.exe%20\(IL%20Disassembler\).md) from viewing header information and meta-information.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to apply the SuppressIldasmAttribute attribute to an assembly.
[!CODE [Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1)]
